Key Match Events: Charith Asalanka's men bounced back in style, shooting out the Windies for a paltry 89-run total in response to their 163-run target.
Sri Lanka won by 73 runs to level the series 1-1.
Brandon King and Evin Lewis starred at the top of the order to help the West Indies to a five-wicket victory in the first T20I.
Kamindu Mendis scored 51 and Charith Asalanka scored 59 in the first T20I.
Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka captain Charith Asalanka won the toss and decided to bat first against West Indies.
Others: The T20I series will be followed by a three-match ODI series in Pallekele, starting October 20.
